== vsync - weibo sync ==

=== DB Design: ===
*tencent*
    `id` INT(10) PRIMARY KEY UNSIGEND NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增长id'
    `access_token` CHAR(42) NOT NULL COMMENT '访问凭证'
    `refresh_token` CHAR(42) NOT NULL COMMENT '刷新凭证'
    `openid` CHAR(42) NOT NULL '用户统一标识'
    `ctime` INT(10) UNSIGEND NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间'
*sina*
    `id` INT(10) PRIMARY KEY UNSIGEND NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增长id'
    `access_token` CHAR(42) NOT NULL COMMENT '访问凭证'
    `uid` INT(10) UNSIGEND NOT NULL COMMENT '用户id'
    `ctime` INT(10) UNSIGEND NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间'
*sync*
    `id` CHAR(32) PRIMARY KEY  NOT NULL COMMENT '自增长id'
    `t_id` CHAR(42) NOT NULL COMMENT '腾讯表id'
    `s_id` CHAR(42) NOT NULL COMMENT '新浪表id'
    `type` TINYINT(2) UNSIGEND NOT NULL COMMENT '同步方式(1双向2关闭3腾讯->新浪4新浪->腾讯)'
    `ctime` INT(10) UNSIGEND NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间'
    `mtime` INT(10) UNSIGEND NOT NULL COMMENT '修改时间'
